name: Beyond Your Dreams
description:
A magical girl, Maho wakes up and finds herself trapped in a mysterious facility. The facility has a large number of tricks, and she must solve them to solve the mystery of the facility.

Who is Maho and why was she locked in the facility?

This game is a puzzle game in which the player transfers her consciousness to objects to clear a path and reach the goal.  At present, 24 stages are included. A portion of the proceeds goes back into development costs.

This game is another story of "Vivid Dream Worlds", a 2D action game currently under development.

Follow us on Twitter to receive information and support "Vivid Dream Worlds"!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/flexDevelop_JP
